title: S. P. Balasubrahmanyam
summary: Sripathi Panditaradhyula Balasubrahmanyam (4 June 1946 â€“ 25 September 2020), also known as SPB or Balu, was an Indian playback singer, television presenter, music director, actor and film producer who worked predominantly in Telugu, Tamil, Kannada, Hindi and Malayalam films.[6][7] SP Balasubrahmanyam is considered to be one of the best singing legends the country has ever produced.[8]
